item.title: On the Assessment of Benchmark Suites for Algorithm Comparison
item.description: Today, we submitted a new paper (On the Assessment of Benchmark Suites for Algorithm Comparison) to the IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computing (and of course to Arxiv).
